issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: All attempts at reproducing this issue failed, or not enough information was available to reproduce the issue. Reading the code produces no clues as to why this behavior would occur. If more information appears later, please reopen the issue.
resolution.name: Cannot Reproduce

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

fields.description:

fields.summary: selinux policy update need to address 'failed to move console log file' on nc

comments.body: The audit messages above do not include any issues related to selinux.  Are you able to rerun ausearch immediately after the issue occurs or use --start and --end time bounds that capture the issue?

The selinux audit log parsing job that is now in CI and Quick Launch jobs. Have not seen it fail in full regression job that runs the block device map suite that would manifest the error based on euca-13145. Resolving as cannot reproduce for now.
